intro:
Wash away the dirt in a calm and relaxing way, surrounded by soothing nature sounds and the gentle flow of a nearby river.
Unlock new upgrades and take on larger houses to clean.
description:
Keep everything spotless with your high-pressure washer — no rush, no stress, just pure peace of mind.

As you progress, you’ll unlock valuable upgrades and take on larger, more satisfying homes to clean, making every step of your journey feel even more rewarding.

Enjoy a unique, original soundtrack designed to enhance your Zen experience.

Be ZenWash.
